      • convertAmount

        public static java.lang.String convertAmount(java.lang.String amount,
                                             char groupingSeparator,
                                             char decimalSeparator,
                                             java.lang.String pattern)
        Format at amount in any currency

        For example: You have a string="1000" You call the method convertAmount and set the parameters ("1000", ' ', '.', "$ #,###") So the method return "$ 1 000

        Parameters:
        amount - Amount at parse
        groupingSeparator - Separator of numbers
        decimalSeparator - Separator decimal
        pattern - Conversion format
